channel.title: How do I edit amount of xp given?
channel.description: Well I'm wondering how to edit the amount of xp an object gives you.(EX: click on hay bales get 5000xp)

item.title: How do I edit amount of xp given?
item.dc:creator: @77ty4w 77ty4w
item.description:
@77ty4w wrote:

Thanks I’ll try that[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 09, 2007, 10:48:16 AM[/size][hr]well i searched that and found

addSkillXP((server.XP.DuAttackXPGain*playerLevel[0]), 0); addSkillXP((server.XP.DuHitpointsXPGain*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((server.XP.DuSlayerXPGain*playerLevel[18]), 18);

which do i edit?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 09, 2007, 11:36:52 AM[/size][hr]still need help

Read full topic
item.source: How do I edit amount of xp given?

item.title: How do I edit amount of xp given?

item.description:
@delta wrote:

Search for what the hay says like “you search through the hay” or whatever it is on your server
Then in that code, change the number
